comment.raw:
/**
 * Walks a directory recursively and calls a callback for each file.
 *
 * @param dir - The directory to walk.
 *
 * @param cb - The callback to call for each file.
 *
 * @param filter - Optional regex to filter files names by.
 *
 * @example
 * ```ts
 * import { walkdir } from 'fractils'
 *
 * walkdir('./static', console.log, /\.jpg$/)
 * ```
 *
 * @nodejs
 */
comment.summary: Walks a directory recursively and calls a callback for each file.

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback to call for each file.

params.name: filter
params.description: Optional regex to filter files names by.

examples.content:
import { walkdir } from 'fractils'

walkdir('./static', console.log, /\.jpg$/)

@nodejs
